thread.title: Thursday’s News Digest: Music Festivals in London and Monterey, and Bareburger in Tokyo
thread.title_full: Thursday’s News Digest: Music Festivals in London and Monterey, and Bareburger in Tokyo - The New York Times

author: Shivani Vora
title: Thursday’s News Digest: Music Festivals in London and Monterey, and Bareburger in Tokyo
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes information about restaurants, music festivals and shows, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
LONDON’S MUSICAL SEASON
“Autumn Season of Culture” is a campaign from London’s official city guide, Visit London , to promote art and music events in the fall. The season kicks off on Sept. 12 with BBC Proms in the Park , the country’s largest classical music event. The program will be held in Hyde Park and features 13 performers such as the opera soprano Danielle de Niese accompanied by the BBC Concert Orchestra and the cast of the West End show “Memphis the Musical.” Ticket buyers can bring chairs and blankets as well as food. Prices from $65.
JAZZ IN MONTEREY
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section. Can a Hotel Robot Read a ‘Do Not Disturb’ Sign?
